trans-unit.source: Provides methods for identifying the components of a component.
trans-unit.target: 提供方法可以識別元件的元件。

trans-unit.source: This interface provides methods that can be used to identify components of a component that are inherited from a base class.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面提供可用來識別某個元件的元件繼承自基底類別的方法。

trans-unit.source: To determine what components are inherited, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A> method and pass the component to search and an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> to store references to the identified components.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷哪些元件會繼承，呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A>方法並傳入要搜尋的元件和<xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>來儲存識別元件的參考。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.GetInheritanceAttribute%2A> method to retrieve an <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> for a component that has been identified by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.GetInheritanceAttribute%2A>方法來擷取<xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>被識別為元件<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.GetInheritanceAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: Searches the specified component for fields that implement the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> interface and adds each to the specified container, storing the inheritance level of each which can be retrieved using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.GetInheritanceAttribute*> method.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋指定的元件，可實作欄位<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>介面，並加入至指定的容器，儲存的每個可以使用擷取該繼承層級的每個<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.GetInheritanceAttribute*>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.GetInheritanceAttribute*>

trans-unit.source: This method searches the specified component for any fields that implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>, adds each to the specified container, and stores an <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> for each.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會搜尋指定的元件之所有欄位的實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>、 加入每個指定的容器，並將儲存<xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>每。</xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> for a component indicates whether the field is inherited from a base class and can be retrieved using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.GetInheritanceAttribute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>元件指出欄位是否繼承自基底類別，並可以使用擷取<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.GetInheritanceAttribute%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.GetInheritanceAttribute%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Gets the inheritance attribute for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之元件的繼承屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the component has been profiled by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A> method, this method returns the value <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute.NotInherited?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如果元件有尚未分析的<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A>方法，這個方法會傳回值<xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute.NotInherited?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute.NotInherited?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it returns the inheritance attribute for this component.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它會傳回這個元件的繼承屬性。

trans-unit.source: You should call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A> on the specified component or a parent of the specified component before attempting to obtain an <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> that reflects the inheritance level of the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 您應該呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A>上指定的元件或之前嘗試取得指定之元件的父代<xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>，以反映繼承的層級指定的元件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> for which to retrieve the inheritance attribute.
An instance of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"></xref> that describes the level of inheritance of the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"></xref>描述繼承的指定元件的層級。
